verses.name: Job 21:14
verses.text: Therefore they say unto God, Depart from us; for we desire not the knowledge of thy ways.

verses.name: Job 21:15
verses.text: What is the Almighty, that we should serve him? and what profit should we have, if we pray unto him?

verses.name: Job 21:16
verses.text: Lo, their good is not in their hand: the counsel of the wicked is far from me.

verses.name: Job 21:17
verses.text: How oft is the candle of the wicked put out! and how oft cometh their destruction upon them! God distributeth sorrows in his anger.

verses.name: Job 21:18
verses.text: They are as stubble before the wind, and as chaff that the storm carrieth away.
